traits.Amphibious: The salvager can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier.
actions.Coral Rapier: Melee Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Inject Toxin (2/Day): Melee Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
